text:
Kerry Gerard Shine (born 5 October 1948) is an Australian politician and solicitor. He is a member of the Labor Party. He was a member of the Legislative Assembly of Queensland for Toowoomba North from 2001 to 2012. He also served as Attorney-General of Queensland from 2006 to 2009. He became a member of Toowoomba Regional Council in March 2020. Before his political career, he co-founded the law firm Shine Lawyers.
Shine was born in Toowoomba, Queensland. He has three children.
